title: He drank the red Kool-Aid
author: VD
content_html: I had no idea that the Original Cyberpunk was such a Schwarzenegger enthusiast. Or so well-versed on vampires. Although, I have to admit, I’ve never been to a more electrifying movie on opening night than Total Recall. The mood was more like a rock concert than a movie, and when the screen went red, then flashed SCHWARZENEGGER in giant white letters across the screen, the entire crowd just roared. I’ve never seen anything like it before or since. Pity the movie was merely okay.
